indicative.translation[0].definitions[0]: an indicative verb form is used for making statements
indicative.translation[1].definitions[0]: the form of a verb that is used to make statements. For example, in the sentences ‘Penny passed her test’ and ‘Michael likes cake’, the verbs ‘passed’ and ‘likes’ are in the indicative.
indicative.translation[2].definitions[0]: an indicative offer or price shows how much someone might pay or charge but is not definite
We will then invite interested parties to make indicative offers.
